content.value: Cut the bacon into small cubes, throw it into a heated pan and fry, stirring constantly, until browned.
Chop the onion and garlic. Remove the bacon from the pan and fry the onion and garlic in the fat that has rendered it.
Add wine to the onion. Stew everything for about 5 minutes.
In a bowl, mix the yolks, cream and cheese. Season with salt, pepper and basil.
Add it to the pan together with the previously fried bacon. We wait until the sauce thickens.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and mix thoroughly
Spices: chili, cumin, paprika, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper
Rub the chicken breast with spices, set aside for 30 minutes or in the fridge for longer.
Fry the chicken breast a little in the pan.
Grease an ovenproof dish with olive oil and add mixed vegetables with fried meat and spices.
Bake in the oven until it is ready.
